# Gemini Subtitle Pro

> AI-powered professional subtitle generation tool with auto glossary extraction, speaker recognition, and millisecond alignment.

## About

Gemini Subtitle Pro is an open-source subtitle generation application powered by Google Gemini AI. It transforms 30-minute videos into professionally subtitled content in just 8 minutes, with zero manual proofreading required.

## Key Features

- **Glossary Auto-Extraction**: Automatically extracts domain-specific terms and maintains consistent translations
- **Speaker Diarization**: Identifies and labels different speakers in conversations
- **Millisecond Alignment**: Precise subtitle timing using forced alignment technology
- **Multi-language Support**: Chinese, English, Japanese UI with auto-detection of source language
- **Full Automation**: Download → Transcribe → Translate → Encode in one seamless pipeline

## Documentation

- [Home (Chinese)](https://aisub.netlify.app/)
- [Home (English)](https://aisub.netlify.app/en/)
- [Quick Start Guide](https://aisub.netlify.app/guide/)
- [Quick Start Guide (English)](https://aisub.netlify.app/en/guide/)
- [Architecture Overview](https://aisub.netlify.app/architecture/)
- [Architecture Overview (English)](https://aisub.netlify.app/en/architecture/)

## Technical Stack

- Frontend: React + TypeScript
- Desktop: Electron
- AI: Google Gemini API
- Speech Recognition: Whisper (local or cloud)
- Forced Alignment: MMS-FA model

## Links

- GitHub: https://github.com/corvo007/Gemini-Subtitle-Pro
- Live Demo: https://aisub-demo.netlify.app/
- Documentation: https://aisub.netlify.app/
